description: Stock market ticker widget Widget that shows your stock portolio in a resizable grid. You can sort the list by drag-and-drop and the list can be exported and re-imported. Features: * Completely resizable, it will fit the number columns base on the width you set. * Scrollable, so you don't have to worry about adding more widgets * Stocks are sorted by change in percent (descending), or you can rearrange them yourself * You can set custom refresh intervals and start/end times * You can import and export your portfolio from a json or textfile * Add multiple portfolios to multiple widgets * View recent news for your tracked symbols * View graphs for your tracked symbols * Notification alerts for your followed symbols
